name: Leap of Faith (Sombrero Guy)
description:
One clumsy mistake sends your marriage proposal into a deadly descent in this short pixel art adventure!

Made for the Ludum Dare 47 game jam by:
Johnny: https://sombrero-guy.itch.io/
Lucas: https://www.instagram.com/lucasnolf/?hl=en

Link to Ludum Dare page here
